title: Is there an exception to every rule? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most rules are statistical generalizations. There are a few whose applicability is universal. A. Respect reality more than guesses. B. Be yourself, and realize you are part of the whole. C. Understand that actions have effects. D. Know that you change, the days change, the seasons change, yet there is underlying persistence. if you act consistently with A through D as a base. you will win more often, and have fewer collisions,
